CustomField.description: Sometimes, the calc items passed into rollup need to be re-queried for - this can happen if you have a polymorphic where clause, or if your where clause contains parent-level filters. This number dictates when those requeries happen before rollup kicks off, or afterwards.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Sometimes, the calc items passed into rollup need to be re-queried for - this can happen if you have a polymorphic where clause, or if your where clause contains parent-level filters. This number dictates when those requeries happen before rollup kicks off, or afterwards.
CustomField.label: Replace Calc Items Async When Over Count
